value:
$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$bEvBg_EmbraAnotherThrone_before|$Fi2000|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Normal2|So, this is the true face of these
mortal beasts... Of course it is.$k$pThere will be those who come
for Askr's life as well...$k$pThey will betray the trust he places
in them so blindly. And this is all
the proof I need.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Right you are. But even so...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|...I must kill them.$k$p$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|But if you kill them, the mortals are
sure to spread rumors about you,
to sow fear and vile intent...$k$pEven those who now love you dearly
will retreat from you... If you would,
please reconsider, Lady Embla.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$Sbs2000|$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|

$WmMPID_エリス,ch01_53_Ellis_F_Normal,Face|Marth is the hope—and the future—
of Altea.$k$p$Sbs1000|
